27 // Class Definitions
30 enum class AudioSourceFlag {
31  kLooping = 1 << 0, // Whether or not the sound plays on repeat
32  kSingleInstance = 1 << 1, // Whether or not the more than one instance of the sound can be played at once
33  kTickOnInaudible = 1 << 2, // Whether or not to keep ticking (playing) the sound when inaudible
34  kKillOnInaudible = 1 << 3, // Whether or not to kill the sound once inaudible
35  //kEnable3D = 1 << 4, // Whether or not 3D processing is enabled for the source (not required if play3d is used)
36  kListenerRelative = 1 << 5, // Whether or not the sound coordinates are relative to a listener at (0, 0, 0)
37  kUseDistanceDelay = 1 << 6 // Whether or not to delay playback based on sound's distance from listener, off by default
38 };
39 typedef QFlags<AudioSourceFlag> AudioSourceFlags;
40 
43 struct AudioSourceSettings {
44 
45  //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
48 
49  bool testFlag(AudioSourceFlag flag) const {
50  return m_audioSourceFlags & (size_t)flag;
51  }
52 
53  void setFlag(AudioSourceFlag flag, bool value) {
54  if (value) {
55  // Toggle flag on
56  m_audioSourceFlags |= (size_t)flag;
57  }
58  else {
59  // Toggle flag off
60  m_audioSourceFlags &= ~(size_t)flag;
61  }
62  }
63 
65 
66  //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
69 
70 
72  QJsonValue asJson(const SerializationContext& context = SerializationContext::Empty()) const;
73 
75  void loadFromJson(const QJsonValue& json, const SerializationContext& context = SerializationContext::Empty());
76 
78 
79  //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
82 
83  size_t m_audioSourceFlags = 0;
84 
85  // TODO: Implement filters
86  int m_filterID = -1;
87 
90  float m_minDistance = 1;
91  float m_maxDistance = 1e6;
92 
95  int m_attenuationModel = 0;
96 
98  float m_rolloff = 1.0f;
99 
101  float m_dopplerFactor = 1.0f;
102 
104  float m_defaultVolume = 1.0f;
105 
107 };
